page.title: 05CHRISTLETON MONDAY PART 2
page.content: Mum met me from school and we enjoyed a walk along the canal to Christleton Mill. I bought some crisps and chocolate to munch on the way home. I saw a young cygnet and a grey squirrel. After completing homework I watched "Blue Peter" my favourite childrens programme together with a news report of Prince Charles and Lady Diana in Italy.James came home on his BMX Bike after playing Rugby at school. Dad arrived home in our Vauxhall car at 6.00pm and we had tea of scrambled eggs, beans, toast, yoghurt and cheese and biscuits. At 6.30pm I watched "Grange Hill" and James played with his "Spectrum Computer".At 7.50pm Mum went to sing with the Village Singers.I was ready for bed at 8.00pm and read one of my favourite books. Later Dad went for his nightly run.
